headline: PPL Corporation announces pricing of equity units offering
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) today announced it has priced its public offering of 20,000,000 Equity Units. Each Equity Unit will be issued in a stated amount of $50 ($1,000,000,000 aggregate stated amount) and will initially be in the form of a Corporate Unit consisting of a contract to purchase PPL Corporation common stock in the future, a 1/40 undivided beneficial ownership interest in PPL Capital Funding Inc.'s 4.02% Remarketable Senior Notes due 2034 having a principal amount of $1,000 and a
